mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS title, d.created_at AS createdAt, d.submitted_at AS submittedAt, al.approved_at AS approvedAt, d.doc_status AS docStatus, al.status AS lineStatus, e.employee_name AS writer, f.form_name AS type FROM draft_documents d INNER JOIN approval_line al ON d.doc_id = al.doc_id LEFT JOIN employee e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN document_form f ON d.form_id = f.form_id WHERE al.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND d.doc_status = #{docStatus} AND al.status = #{lineStatus} ORDER BY d.submitted_at DESC

SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS title, d.created_at AS createdAt, d.submitted_at AS submittedAt, al.approved_at AS approvedAt, d.doc_status AS docStatus, al.status AS lineStatus, e.employee_name AS writer, f.form_name AS type FROM draft_documents d INNER JOIN approval_line al ON d.doc_id = al.doc_id LEFT JOIN employee e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN document_form f ON d.form_id = f.form_id WHERE al.employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY d.submitted_at DESC

SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS title, d.created_at AS createdAt, d.submitted_at AS submittedAt, d.final_approval_at AS approvedAt, d.doc_status AS docStatus, f.form_name AS type, e.employee_name AS writer,
-- 현재 로그인 사용자의 결재 상태 (lineStatus) ( SELECT al.status FROM approval_line al WHERE al.doc_id = d.doc_id AND al.employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY al.step ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS lineStatus
FROM draft_documents d JOIN employee e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN document_form f ON d.form_id = f.form_id WHERE d.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND d.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
